mapper.update: update b_contract set contractid=contractid ,buysellflag=#{buysellflag} ,conttypeid=#{conttypeid} ,contractno=#{contractno} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,storageid=#{storageid} ,grainid=#{grainid} ,grainattrid=#{grainattrid} ,producingyear=#{producingyear} ,grade=#{grade} ,traderid=#{traderid} ,tradartiperson=#{tradartiperson} ,corpartiperson=#{corpartiperson} ,tqty=#{tqty} ,kgqty=#{kgqty} ,tprice=#{tprice} ,kgprice=#{kgprice} ,amount=#{amount} ,execqty=#{execqty} ,exectqty=#{exectqty} ,bailpert=#{bailpert} ,bailrate=#{bailrate} ,bailamt=#{bailamt} ,gqrequire=#{gqrequire} ,partyaagent=#{partyaagent} ,partybagent=#{partybagent} ,partyabanknum=#{partyabanknum} ,partybbanknum=#{partybbanknum} ,filenamelist=#{filenamelist} ,bidno=#{bidno} ,handlingpert=#{handlingpert} ,handlingamt=#{handlingamt} ,signdate=#{signdate} ,execdate=#{execdate} ,completed=#{completed} ,signaddress=#{signaddress} ,honouraddress=#{honouraddress} ,honourstate=#{honourstate} ,honourbegindate=#{honourbegindate} ,honourenddate=#{honourenddate} ,stopflag=#{stopflag} ,stopfile=#{stopfile} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,spuserid=#{spuserid} ,sptime=#{sptime} ,spstatus=#{spstatus} ,spremark=#{spremark} where contractid=#{contractid}

mapper.select: select t.contractid "contractid", t.buysellflag "buysellflag", t.conttypeid "conttypeid", t.contractno "contractno", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.grainid "grainid", t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.producingyear "producingyear", t.grade "grade", t.traderid "traderid", t.tradartiperson "tradartiperson", t.corpartiperson "corpartiperson", t.tqty "tqty", t.kgqty "kgqty", t.tprice "tprice", t.kgprice "kgprice", t.amount "amount", t.execqty "execqty", t.exectqty "exectqty", t.bailpert "bailpert", t.bailrate "bailrate", t.bailamt "bailamt", t.gqrequire "gqrequire", t.partyaagent "partyaagent", t.partybagent "partybagent", t.partyabanknum "partyabanknum", t.partybbanknum "partybbanknum", t.filenamelist "filenamelist", t.bidno "bidno", t.handlingpert "handlingpert", t.handlingamt "handlingamt", t.signdate "signdate", t.execdate "execdate", t.completed "completed", t.signaddress "signaddress", t.honouraddress "honouraddress", t.honourstate "honourstate", t.honourbegindate "honourbegindate", t.honourenddate "honourenddate", t.stopflag "stopflag", t.stopfile "stopfile", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.spuserid "spuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.spstatus "spstatus", t.spremark "spremark", lct.conttypename "conttypename", lg.grainname "grainname", lga.grainattrname "grainattrname", lt.tradername "tradername" from b_contract t LEFT JOIN l_contracttype lct on lct.conttypeid=t.conttypeid LEFT JOIN l_grain lg on lg.grainid=t.grainid LEFT JOIN l_grainattr lga on lga.grainattrid=t.grainattrid LEFT JOIN l_trader lt on lt.traderid=t.traderid where 1=1 and t.contractid=#{contractid} and t.buysellflag=#{buysellflag} and t.conttypeid=#{conttypeid} and t.contractno=#{contractno} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.producingyear=#{producingyear} and t.grade=#{grade} and t.traderid=#{traderid} and t.tradartiperson=#{tradartiperson} and t.corpartiperson=#{corpartiperson} and t.tqty=#{tqty} and t.kgqty=#{kgqty} and t.tprice=#{tprice} and t.kgprice=#{kgprice} and t.amount=#{amount} and t.execqty=#{execqty} and t.exectqty=#{exectqty} and t.bailpert=#{bailpert} and t.bailrate=#{bailrate} and t.bailamt=#{bailamt} and t.gqrequire=#{gqrequire} and t.partyaagent=#{partyaagent} and t.partybagent=#{partybagent} and t.partyabanknum=#{partyabanknum} and t.execdate=#{execdate} and t.completed=#{completed} and t.signaddress=#{signaddress} and t.honouraddress=#{honouraddress} and t.honourstate=#{honourstate} and t.honourbegindate=#{honourbegindate} and t.honourenddate=#{honourenddate} and t.stopflag=#{stopflag} and t.stopfile=#{stopfile} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.spstatus=#{spstatus} and t.spremark=#{spremark}

select count(*) from b_contract t left join l_contracttype lct on lct.conttypeid=t.conttypeid left join l_grain lg on lg.grainid=t.grainid left join l_grainattr lga on lga.grainattrid=t.grainattrid left join l_trader lt on lt.traderid=t.traderid where 1=1 and t.contractid=#{contractid} and t.contractid!=#{NoId} and t.buysellflag=#{buysellflag} and t.conttypeid=#{conttypeid} and t.contractno=#{contractno} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.producingyear=#{producingyear} and t.grade=#{grade} and t.traderid=#{traderid} and t.tradartiperson=#{tradartiperson} and t.corpartiperson=#{corpartiperson} and t.tqty=#{tqty} and t.kgqty=#{kgqty} and t.tprice=#{tprice} and t.kgprice=#{kgprice} and t.amount=#{amount} and t.execqty=#{execqty} and t.exectqty=#{exectqty} and t.bailpert=#{bailpert} and t.bailrate=#{bailrate} and t.bailamt=#{bailamt} and t.gqrequire=#{gqrequire} and t.partyaagent=#{partyaagent} and t.partybagent=#{partybagent} and t.partyabanknum=#{partyabanknum} and t.partybbanknum=#{partybbanknum} and t.filenamelist=#{filenamelist} and t.bidno=#{bidno} and t.handlingpert=#{handlingpert} and t.handlingamt=#{handlingamt} and t.signdate=#{signdate} and t.execdate=#{execdate} and t.completed=#{completed} and t.signaddress=#{signaddress} and t.honouraddress=#{honouraddress} and t.honourstate=#{honourstate} and t.honourbegindate=#{honourbegindate} and t.honourenddate=#{honourenddate} and t.stopflag=#{stopflag} and t.stopfile=#{stopfile} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.spstatus=#{spstatus} and t.spremark=#{spremark}
